name: Warp Room
description:
Warp Room!

Welcome to Warp Room! This is a short puzzle-platformer with a cool room-warping mechanic. Set in a space-base, who will you trust once you get to the end?

This is my second game fully made, I have been using game dev to learn programming. This was a really fun project, everyday the game seemed drastically different from the last.

Gameplay

The player runs and jumps through 9 levels designed to make the player familiar with the room-warping mechanic. Collect all the keys in the level to unlock the portal to carry you forward. Make it from platform to platform above dangerous red spikes, and think about your environment!

Controls

The player's movement can be controlled with A & D or the arrow keys, and you can jump by either using the W key, the up arrow, the Z key, or the space bar.

Full screen mode can be toggled by the F key.

There is a debugging mode which I have decided to leave in so you can play with it if you are interested, if not, ignore the next part of this description and enjoy the game! Thanks!

  • P key toggles debug mode
  • G key restarts game
  • R key restarts level
  • Number brings you to specified level (0 being main menu)
  • O key spawns particle emitter

Thanks for taking the time to read about my project! Enjoy the game, and let me know what you think :)
